summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed Thirty-six and 85/100 Dollars ($36.85), against the General Fund of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of completing the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northeast et al, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, as authorized by Ordinance No. 19513, creating Local Improvement District No. 1867.
